document.title: Technical Bulletins: General Assembly Decides on Tort Immunity for Officials and Employees and Enacts New Tort Limits
document.abstract: This Technical Bulletin discusses changes to the Tennessee Governmental Tort Liability Act, changes which drastically limited the personal liability for job-related torts.
